explains: adj. 学说的，教义的；教诲的

sentences.en: Doctrinal differences were vigorously debated among religious leaders.
sentences.cn: 宗教领袖们就教义上的区别展开了激烈的辩论。

sentences.en: But it seemed to be a minor doctrinal point, with little historical significance.
sentences.cn: 但它似乎只有不大的理论意义，几乎没有什么历史意义。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, doctrinal activists still sing out their contradictions and exaggerations.
sentences.cn: 同时，教条的激进分子还在大声嚷嚷着他们的反驳和夸张之词。
